00040 LaCrop::LaCrop(const LaCrop& theCrop)
00041 {
00042   mName=theCrop.name();
00043   mDescription=theCrop.description();
00044   setGuid(theCrop.guid());
00045   mCropYield=theCrop.cropYield();
00046   mCropCalories=theCrop.cropCalories();
00047   mCropFodderProduction=theCrop.fodderProduction();
00048   mCropFodderValue=theCrop.fodderValue();
00049   mCropFodderEnergyType=theCrop.cropFodderEnergyType();
00050   mAreaUnits=theCrop.areaUnits();
00051   mImageFile=theCrop.imageFile();

00054 LaCrop& LaCrop::operator=(const LaCrop& theCrop)
00055 {
00056   if (this == &theCrop) return *this;     // Gracefully handle self assignment
00057 
00058   mName=theCrop.name();
00059   mDescription=theCrop.description();
00060   setGuid(theCrop.guid());
00061   mCropYield=theCrop.cropYield();
00062   mCropCalories=theCrop.cropCalories();
00063   mCropFodderProduction=theCrop.fodderProduction();
00064   mCropFodderValue=theCrop.fodderValue();
00065   mCropFodderEnergyType=theCrop.cropFodderEnergyType();
00066   mAreaUnits=theCrop.areaUnits();
00067   mImageFile=theCrop.imageFile();
00068   return *this;
00069 }

00147 bool LaCrop::fromXml(QString theXml)
00148 {
00149     //qDebug("Loading Crop from xml");
00150   QDomDocument myDocument("mydocument");
00151   myDocument.setContent(theXml);
00152   QDomElement myTopElement = myDocument.firstChildElement("crop");
00153   if (myTopElement.isNull())
00154   {
00155       //TODO - just make this a warning
00156      //qDebug("top element could not be found!");
00157   }
00158     //qDebug("Crop::fromXml - guid found : " + myTopElement.attribute("guid").toLocal8Bit());
00159   setGuid(myTopElement.attribute("guid"));
00160     //qDebug("Crop::fromXml - guid set to : " + guid().toLocal8Bit());
00161   mName=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("name").text());
00162   mDescription=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("description").text());
00163   mCropYield=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("cropYield").text()).toInt();
00164   mCropCalories=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("cropCalories").text()).toInt();
00165   mCropFodderProduction=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("fodderProduction").text()).toInt();
00166   mCropFodderValue=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("fodderCalories").text()).toInt();
00167   QString myCropFodderEnergyType = QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("cropFodderEnergyType").text());
00168   if (myCropFodderEnergyType == "KCalories")
00169   {
00170     mCropFodderEnergyType=KCalories;
00171   }
00172   else if (myCropFodderEnergyType == "TDN")
00173   {
00174     mCropFodderEnergyType=TDN;
00175   }
00176   
00177     QString myAreaUnits = QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("areaUnits").text());
00178   if (myAreaUnits == "Dunum")
00179   {
00180     mAreaUnits=Dunum;
00181   }
00182   else if (myAreaUnits == "Hectare")
00183   {
00184     mAreaUnits=Hectare;
00185   }
00186   mImageFile=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("imageFile").text());
00187   return true;
00188 }

00190 QString LaCrop::toXml()
00191 {
00192   QString myString;
00193   myString+=QString("<crop guid=\"" + guid() + "\">\n");
00194     myString+=QString("  <name>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</name>\n");
00195   myString+=QString("  <description>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mDescription) + "</description>\n");
00196   myString+=QString("  <cropYield>" + QString::number(mCropYield) + "</cropYield>\n");
00197   myString+=QString("  <cropCalories>" + QString::number(mCropCalories) + "</cropCalories>\n");
00198   myString+=QString("  <fodderProduction>" + QString::number(mCropFodderProduction) + "</fodderProduction>\n");
00199   myString+=QString("  <fodderCalories>" + QString::number(mCropFodderValue) + "</fodderCalories>\n");
00200   
00201   switch (mCropFodderEnergyType)
00202   {
00203     case KCalories:
00204       myString+=QString("  <cropFodderEnergyType>KCalories</cropFodderEnergyType>\n");
00205       break;
00206     case TDN:
00207       myString+=QString("  <cropFodderEnergyType>TDN</cropFodderEnergyType>\n");
00208       break;
00209   }
00210   
00211   switch (mAreaUnits)
00212   {
00213     case Dunum:
00214       myString+=QString("  <areaUnits>Dunum</areaUnits>\n");
00215       break;
00216     case Hectare:
00217       myString+=QString("  <areaUnits>Hectare</areaUnits>\n");
00218       break;
00219   }
00220   myString+=QString("  <imageFile>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mImageFile) + "</imageFile>\n");
00221   myString+=QString("</crop>\n");
00222   return myString;
00223 }
00224 
00225 QString LaCrop::toText()
00226 {
00227   QString myString;
00228   myString+=QString("guid=>" + guid() + "\n");
00229   myString+=QString("name=>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "\n");
00230   myString+=QString("description=>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mDescription) + "\n");
00231   myString+=QString("cropYield=>" + QString::number(mCropYield) + "\n");
00232   myString+=QString("cropCalories=>" + QString::number(mCropCalories) + "\n");
00233   myString+=QString("fodderProduction=>" + QString::number(mCropFodderProduction) + "\n");
00234   myString+=QString("fodderCalories=>" + QString::number(mCropFodderValue) + "\n");
00235   QString myCropFodderEnergyType = (mCropFodderEnergyType==0) ? "KCalories" : "TDN";
00236   myString+=QString("cropFodderEnergyType=>" + myCropFodderEnergyType + "\n");
00237   QString myUnits = (mAreaUnits==0) ? "Dunum" : "Hectare";
00238   myString+=QString("yieldUnits=>" + myUnits + "\n");
00239   return myString;
00240 }
00241 
00242 QString LaCrop::toHtml()
00243 {
00244   QString myString;
00245   myString+="<h3>Details for " + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</h3>";
00246     //myString+="<p>GUID:" + guid() + "</p>";
00247   myString+="<table>";
00248   myString+="<tr><td><b>Description: </b></td><td>" + mDescription + "</td></tr>";
00249   myString+="<tr><td><b>Avg Yield: </b></td><td>" + QString::number(mCropYield) + "</td></tr>";
00250   myString+="<tr><td><b>Cals/Kg: </b></td><td>" + QString::number(mCropCalories) + "</td></tr>";
00251   QString myCropFodderEnergyType = (mCropFodderEnergyType==0) ? "KCalories" : "TDN";
00252   QString myUnits = (mAreaUnits==0) ? "Dunum" : "Hectare";
00253   myString+="<tr><td><b>Fodder (kg/" + myUnits + "): </b></td><td>" + QString::number(mCropFodderProduction) + "</td></tr>";
00254   myString+="<tr><td><b>Fodder Value/Kg: </b></td><td>" + QString::number(mCropFodderValue) + "</td></tr>";
00255   myString+="<tr><td><b>FodderEnergyType: </b></td><td>" + myCropFodderEnergyType + "</td></tr>";
00256   myString+="<tr><td><b>AreaUnits: </b></td><td>" + myUnits + "</td></tr>";
00257   myString+="</table>";
00258   return myString;
00259 }
